archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1475
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a credit manager, I want to be able to priorise the queue of manual assessments based on application channel, customer type, etc, so that I can perform manual assessments in the most effective order.

properties.value: To be discussed. Is it requirement for system to enable manual assessment cases ordering on specified criteria?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
